comment: I would not suggest anyone ever take her class. Her homework does not match her quizzes and her quizzes dont match her test. I hired a tutor who has helped other students get As in stat to help me and she couldnt even figure out what this professor was doing. And gives a project thats worth a ton of points thats all busy work and pointless
rating_tags: Tough Grader--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Clear grading criteria

comment: Took her online STAT class and it was definitely a good decision. She posts video power points each week and is very effective at actually teaching the content to make it understandable. She provides lot of extra study guides and worksheets that are optional. There is a homework assignment and quiz once a week. Communication is key.

"3 on rating, but you wouldn't take her again?" Well, here's the thing. Kohler's a pretty solid professor; however she seems to have this thing about sending emails that come off rather rude, which is a dealbreaker. And her recorded lecture audio quality is meh most of the time, but that's a nitpick. Didn't wanna email her and get chewed out.

Dr. Kohler has a good teaching style. She is very organized in her weekly content and the videos are helpful. However, she is one of the rudest professors I have ever had. She will not help you out if you need it and she is not understanding at all.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Tests are tough

comment: DO NOT TAKE HER! Very rude in responding to emails. SHE WILL NOT WORK WITH YOU.. I had surgery while taking her online course and she refused to extend any due dates. Ridiculously hard projects, weekly quizzes and homework that takes a long time to do, especially if you have a busy schedule. AVOID HER AT ALL COSTS
rating_tags: Tough Grader--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: The rudest professor I have ever encountered. Asked a question at the beginning of the semester she responded rudely. Very rude and condescending. Do not take her class unless you are great with statistics. She gives research papers. One of mine ended up being 16 pages long. She requires you to drive to about 10 stores to gather data.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--TEST HEAVY

comment: I was ready to give this professor a bad grade because a lot of what is said about her can be considered true. She comes off as condescending in emails and is not especially willing to go outside of her syllabus. However, she gives a lot of opportunity and is more fair than she first seems. You have to do a lot of work but if you do it you can pass

I really hate to say how much I dislike the way she teaches, her attitude and how truly rude she is towards students. I took her online, DO NOT MAKE THE SAME MISTAKE. I have had multiple issues with her, assumes her students lie to make excuses. Doesn't work with you in any way. she lacks caring for her students.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: This class is ridiculous.  Not only do we have homework and weekly quizzes, but very hard, detailed projects.  Also, several videos each week to watch.  Run as fast as you can and take another teacher.  The head of the department needs to get rid of her.  I think she assumes this is our only class.

Quiz/test questions come from a test bank and answers were often wrong, she would make an excuse. She messed up in her online videos and would make an excuse - don't say OOOPS when I've spent twenty minutes listening to you explain hard content incorrectly then make an excuse. Projects sucked HARD. Shame you have to instruct the instructor.

Professor Kohler does a good job making the math easy to understand. I personally hate math and I thought I would do terrible in this class, but I'm getting an A+. As long as you do all the homework and follow the instructions to the letter you will do fine.

I had this class online and I was requried to drive all over God's green earth gathering information for a project which was incredibly specific. Since this completely destroys the reason you take online classes I cannot possibly recommend this teacher. She answers questions by telling you to go to her "instructional" videos and they are useless.

If you're good at math and never have any issues with any of the course material, this class will be easy. If you EVER have to contact the Professor, be prepared to be condescended. She will never help you. She will only tell you what you've done wrong. And that's if she even reads your email.
Careful if you take her online class! She has no sympathy if you run into issues taking quizzes or tests online. She takes off points for petty things and for things she doesn't put in the rubric.
She is a tough online grader. Test are pretty difficult.

Was surprised to have made an A. It's only because I made sure to go to the SI sessions and youtubed videos. The group projects are a pain and count A LOT. Very picky. Although she can have her nice moments, is very rude and condescending. Doesn't like for questions to be asked in class. Not a class if easily offended. MUST put in a lot of time.

This teacher is not clear on anything.  She is unapproachable. This is a gen-ed class it shouldn't have the work of an upper-level class.  The stress of this teacher caused me to drop I will take it with a better teacher because I like to actually learn what I take and pay for.  I was not learning just stressing.  Life is to short for that!

Avoid, avoid, avoid. I received and A in her class but she seems slightly unstable. It was clear that her personal life was interfering with her professional life.  Although there seemed to be some heartbreak, I do think that she needed to take some time off in order to get her life and emotions back together. Very rude and shouted a lot.
overall terrible teacher

Avoid this teacher like the plague. Her material isn't that tough,  but she looks for any excuse she can get to take off points or fail you. If you take her, you MUST be clear on every answer, I cannot stress this enough. Does not tolerate any kind of disruptions. Provides SI sessions, but they will be set at fixed times; can't make it, too bad.

Expect to have no life if you take this class. So. Much. Work. Kohler is helpful if you want to learn. Very hard class but I came out with a B.. and I hate math. Do your study guides and print off all stuff before class!

I had Mrs. Kohler in high school and although she is strict and a hard teacher she's a very good teacher.  If you don't understand something and ask after class she'll clarify.  She is a tad strange but a sweet lady.

Soooo rude! I hate math and she made it worse, she sends emails at a late hours but won't reply back. Was somewhat helpful during office hours. Tons of hw and quizzes. The in-class quizzes were helpful she should have been doing that all along. Oh you can't make up test either. Take someone else!

The teacher is extremely moody! She also picks her favorite students which is obnoxious. She cannot explain everything well, you mainly have to teach yourself, and there is at least one or two homeworks everyday! Oh and let's not forget about the daily in class quizzes! If you can get anyone else besides her, do it. I promise.
I actually had her in high school and she yelled at me for staring at her too much, excuse me that I'm trying to learn! Very scatterbrained and confused.

I don't know why this woman hass bad reviews. She was fantastic. I have a disability, and she went above and beyond to make sure I had what I needed. She absolutely does answer questions and she came in on Sundays to do review sessions for tests. Also she gave extra credit opportunities.

Nice lady, not so nice teacher. Does not explain anything and gets angry real easily. three tests, one weird project and a TON of HW and quizzes. I got an 89, she does not round up, I recommend not taking her!

Not sure how i felt about her. on somedays she was nice, others not so much. math is my WORSE subject. i just can't understand it. yet, for some weird reason, i almost got an A in her class. theres TONS of homework and only 3 test worth 50% of your grade.TEACH YOURSELF. along with a weird project. Id say don't take her, but my grade says different.

By far the worst teacher I have had. She would get angry when asked questions about the material. Her examples did not ever make sense, the test subject material would be different from what you were taught in class. She always rushed through chapters and never took the time to see if you understood the previous one! Do not take if you want to pass

I really liked Mrs. Kohler. I don't know why she has such bad ratings, she's really sweet. She gets a little confused sometimes, but if you actually study you'll do fine. Also, DO THE HOMEWORK as you go along because a lot of the time she'll give you extra points on the tests.

The worst math teacher I have ever had.  I had to teach myself most of the class(praise to KSU math lab)  Every other post about this woman is completly true.  We lost half of the class at midterm, which is a very bad sign.  I cannot believe that KSU allows this caliber of teacher in their halls.
Not much to say here. NOT helpful at all, her tests are totally irrelevant, she never uses the book, and she treats you like you are a fifth grader.

I am a non-traditional student (39 yrs old) with a GPA of 3.8. I have taken 4 Math courses to work up to this one. Unfortunately, a Math Professor can make or break you. She is the latter.If u have taken statistics before...great. If not, drop! There's no explantation as to what she's doing, she's extremely fast on calculator, has random thoughts.

Do Not Take This Class!! She is the worst professor I have ever had. She is unorganized and her examples don't make sense. The questions on the test are nothing like anything you do in the class and she has scattered grading policies. She is also a wretched woman to talk. Asking her questions is useless and her lessons don't make sense
she is an awful woman and does not explain herself. she gets mad if you ask her questions and she treats us like were 5. DO NOT TAKE HER CLASS. :)
Worst professor EVER!! Very rude, and treats students like children. Is not clear in expplaining the chapters.

Avoid her class at all cost. She  does not explain the lesson very well and is condescending and rude when you ask questions. She has gotten in several loud arguments with students over legitimate questions about grades and homework. I reported her to the math chair  for being so hostile. I have never spoken in class and am terrified to talk to her

Prof. Kohler is not a good teacher. She does not make herself available to students, and does not answer questions. She makes everything a lot harder than it should be for her students, and the tests do not reflect the problems you do in class or in your homework. Avoid taking this class.

Horrible Teacher. Took her for math 1107 she does not take the time to explain & making sure her students understand the subject. Instead when she's explaining the subject you get more confuse while sitting in class. I had to go to the math lab for help. You get thrown out of class if she sees you on your cell phone. Do not take her if you have too

Took Mrs. Kohler in high school. Everyone from my HS knows to not take one of the kohlers. That being said, if you're not great at math don't take either of them. Seriously, they won't help you and you'll be better off asking another math professor or friend.

She's probably the worst possible teacher you can get if you're average at math. She hates answering questions and will never re-explain a concept if a student doesn't understand. DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS WITH HER.

Dr. Kohler is extremely hostile when you ask questions, and she doesn't even bother to answer them. She puts things on the tests that you've never seen before and aren't in the book. Everyone in my class has filed complaints against her to the dean. I'm an honors student with a 3.7 GPA, and I had to drop this class. She is THE worst teacher.
